children.name: Avtorskaya pesnya
children.description: Originating in the Soviet Union taking cues from forms of Russian Romance and Russian poetry with the main focus on lyrics.

children.name: Russian Chanson
children.description: Divided into lyrical and criminal chanson, it is best described as narrative-driven popular music inspired by crime and prison.

children.name: Russian Folk Music
children.description: Eastern Slavic Folk Music native to the Russian people.

children.name: Russian Orthodox Liturgical Music
children.description: Tradition of the Russian Orthodox Church, implemented with the Christianization of Kievan Rus' in 988.

children.name: Russian Romance
children.description: Popular Russian genre of melancholy balladry.
